channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped sofa cushions, 29th September
item.description:
These have been dumped here, presumably by residents of 202 as there are more out the front

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Welland Drive, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 29th September
item.description:
Flytipping in lay-by on Frogfurlong Lane plus lots of litter along length of lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frog Furlong Lane, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped mattress entrance to New Rutland Court, 29th September
item.description:
Mattress Flytipped on pavement leaning against substation, entrance to New Rutland Court from Swindon Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Rutland Court, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 29th September
item.description:
Give and take 28 days plus temporary footway closure required please cut back overgrown tree branches hanging over footway and carriage way approximately 3 metres x 3 metres (Overgrown Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 29th September
item.description:
Please reinstate 2 x 900mm kerb that has have dipped and use concrete post mix on chipped edge - Standard TM - 28 days (FW Kerbing Defects)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 29th September
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects -other CW10 problem, 29th September

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly posting in Minster Churchyard, 29th September
item.description:
This is a Heritage Site!! The flyposters are advertising an event at 14 Regent Street Cheltenham GL50 1HE. This is illegal and the perpetrators should be fined.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chester Walk, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
